item.title: 2020 12 30 Arc Patternsns
item.description: In this post series, I will (to refresh) review the architectural patterns, advantages, disadvantages and decays.I am reviewing recent books, articals and will combine with my experience and with realworld examples. Layered Architecture Service Oriented Architecture Event Driven Architecture Microservices Architecture Microkernel Architecture
